section.p: This template represents the observation that a patient has died. It also represents the cause of death, indicated by an entryRelationship type of 'CAUS'. This template allows for more specific representation of data than is available with the use of dischargeDispositionCode.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-14871, CONF:1198-14872, CONF:1198-32541 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.79"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Deceased Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.79)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-14853)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1198-19135, CONF:1198-32158)

SHOULD contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-14868, CONF:1198-14875, CONF:1198-14870)
Contains @typeCode="CAUS" CAUS
Conforms to Problem Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Deceased Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.79)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14851, R2.1=CONF:1198-14851)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14852, R2.1=CONF:1198-14852)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14873, R2.1=CONF:1198-14873)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-14853)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1198-19135, CONF:1198-32158)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:14854, R2.1=CONF:1198-14854)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (R2.1=CONF:1198-19095)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14855, R2.1=CONF:1198-14855)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:14857, R2.1=CONF:1198-14857)/@code="419099009" Dead (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:15142, R2.1=CONF:1198-15142)

SHOULD contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-14868, CONF:1198-14875, CONF:1198-14870)
Contains @typeCode="CAUS" CAUS
Conforms to Problem Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01)
effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:14874, R2.1=CONF:1198-14874)

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.79" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.79"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="200446726"/> <code code="ASSERTION" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4" codeSystemName="HL7ActCode" displayName="Assertion"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="816569699"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor/> </author> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.113"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="954412256"/> <code code="75328-5" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Prognosis"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="521554572"/> <code code="225773000" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT" displayName="Preference"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="1428790752"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> </author> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="281006470"/> <code code="11323-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Health status"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="1791980820"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.6"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1284037507"/> <code code="33999-4" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Status"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="429906536"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:14871, CONF:14872 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.79"
Consol Deceased Observation effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:14874, R2.1=CONF:1198-14874)
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Deceased Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14851, R2.1=CONF:1198-14851)
Consol Deceased Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14852, R2.1=CONF:1198-14852)
Consol Deceased Observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14873, R2.1=CONF:1198-14873)
Consol Deceased Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14853)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode)

Consol Deceased Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:14854, R2.1=CONF:1198-14854)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (R2.1=CONF:1198-19095)
Consol Deceased Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14855, R2.1=CONF:1198-14855)

Consol Deceased Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:14857, R2.1=CONF:1198-14857)/@code="419099009" Dead (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:15142, R2.1=CONF:1198-15142)

Consol Deceased Observation SHOULD contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:14868, CONF:14875, CONF:14870) Contains @typeCode="CAUS" CAUS, and Conforms to Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
